entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 09:25 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
